artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Gosokusai Jōfu
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill Jr.
inscription: ... 呉足斎丈布 Ōharame no / kashitra ni / tako no / suitsuite / ato shitai yuku / ito no harukaze, Gosokusai Jōfu (A kite is stuck / on a bundle carried by a woman of Ōhara. / The string follows along / in the spring breeze / as if it were her admirer, Gosokusai Jōfu)
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: Woman of Ōhara with Firewood Bundle and Kite
